metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17916 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** SQL injection vulnerability in the 'find_by' method in Rubyon Rails 5.1.4 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQLcommands via the 'name' parameter. NOTE: The vendor disputes this issuebecause the documentation states that this method is not intended for usewith untrusted input.

criterions.comment: rails package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
